properties.name: Beaver Creek
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4This is just another great ski resort in Colorado. I wouldn\'t say that it is as nice as Vail or Deer Valley, but still I had NO complaints. The weather was great and the skiing was just as fun as it is anywhere.

properties.name: Breckenridge
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4Breckenridge was a great ski resort. My experience here was not as good as most others, but I think that it was due to the weather. We experienced temperatures down to -20 degrees F. The slopes and facilities were just as nice as anywhere I have been, but when I was there the weather was brutal.

properties.name: Hilton Head Island
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4Hilton Head is another summer time favorite of mine. My aunt and uncle have a time share in Hilton Head and they invite my family to go with them every year for a week. Last time we got to go deep sea fishing. Hilton Head is very fun and chill. You can always find live music to just sit around to listen and drink. The photo is of my family and my aunt and uncle\'s family.

properties.name: Orange Beach
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4  Orange Beach is a great family vacation. There is a water park near by and great food and night life. One of the many fun things to do here is go to the Alabama and Florida state line and start boozin\' at the Florabama Lounge.

properties.name: Panama City Beach
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4  My group of friends and I went to Panama City Beach for our senior trip. This place is geared more for the party scene. It has more bars and fun things to do than a place like St. John or Hilton Head.

properties.name: Park City
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4Park City, Utah is the firs place my family went skiing out West. It is my favorite place to go as far as nightlife. The town was fun for kids and adults. We took one day off from skiing and went on a snowmobile tour. The scenery here is incredible.

properties.name: Snowshoe
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4This is the place that I first learned to snow ski. In my opinion it is the nicest place to snow ski in the East. Everything there was top notch. The slopes were nice, the grooming was good and the mountain staff is friendly. Our condo here was ski in ski out with an outdoor hot tub that hit the spot every time.

properties.name: St. John
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4This is by far my favorite vacation that I have ever gone on. My family and I went to St. John in the United States Virgin Islands the summer that I graduated high school. The resort was fantastic, the town had wonderful restaurants, the views were spectacular, and the snorkeling was beautiful. The photo is of me looking down on the famous Trunk Bay.

properties.name: Steamboat
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4Steamboat was another great place for skiing. The powder was great and the services were incredible. The slopes were pleasant, but also had what it took to satisfy your extreme side.

properties.name: Vail
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4Vail, Colorado is one of the nicest places that I have ever been to snow ski. The skiing was great and the town was beautiful as well as fun. There were bars and restaurants all up and down the main road.

properties.name: Watts Bar Lake
properties.description: Posted by Dsteven4This is the location of my most visited vacation spot. My parents and aunt and uncle share a lake house here. Once a summer my family will spend a week here enjoying our friends and family. We have a boat that we use to enjoy water sports and entertain our guests. Watts Bar Lake is a great place for bars restaurants, live music, and the Fourth of July celebration is HUGE here.
